casebody.data:
Cincinnati Bar Association v. McConnell.

[Cite as Cincinnati Bar Assn. v. McConnell (1989), 43 Ohio St. 3d 610.]

(No. D.D. 81-16 Submitted May 3, 1989 Decided June 14, 1989.)

On Petition for Reinstatement.

The petition for reinstatement to the practice of law is granted on the condition that petitioner, Terrance A. McConnell, make full restitution in the sum of $3,750 to Loretta Campbell prior to his taking the oath of office and this court’s issuing the order of reinstatement.

(For earlier case, see Cincinnati Bar Assn. v. McConnell [1981], 68 Ohio St. 2d 60, 22 O.O. 3d 263, 428 N.E. 2d 414.)

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
